getSimulatedBuy.-2: cost updating error (did you enter a valid quantity?)

getSimulatedSell.-2: cost updating error (did you enter a valid quantity?)

report.-1: report length does not match number of expiring events

submitReportHash.-1: reporter (you) doesn't (don't) exist, or voting period over or hasn't started yet
submitReportHash.-2: not in hash submitting timeframe or event doesn't exist / not a valid event expiring then

checkReportValidity.-2: reporter doesn't exist, voting period is over, or voting period hasn't started yet

createSubbranch.-1: bad input or parent doesn't exist
createSubbranch.-2: no money for creation fee or branch already exists

createEvent.0: not enough money to pay fees or event already exists
createEvent.-1: we're either already past that date, branch doesn't exist, or description is bad

createMarket.-1: bad input or parent doesn't exist
createMarket.-4: not enough money or market already exists

sendReputation.-1: Your reputation account was just created! Earn some reputation before you can send to others

buyShares.-2: entered a negative number of shares

sellShares.-2: entered a negative number of shares

WHISPER_POST_FAILED.message: could not post message to whisper

INVALID_CONTRACT_PARAMETER.message: cannot send object parameter to contract

PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT.message: password must be at least 6 characters long

NULL_CALL_RETURN.message: expected contract call to return value, received null

NULL_RESPONSE.message: expected transaction hash from Ethereum node, received null

INVALID_RESPONSE.message: could not parse response from Ethereum node

LOCAL_NODE_FAILURE.message: RPC request to local Ethereum node failed

HOSTED_NODE_FAILURE.message: RPC request to hosted nodes failed

TRANSACTION_NOT_CONFIRMED.message: polled network but could not confirm transaction

IPFS_ADD_FAILURE.message: files could not be added to IPFS

IPFS_GET_FAILURE.message: could not retrieve file from IPFS

RPC_TIMEOUT.message: timed out while waiting for Ethereum network response

LOOPBACK_NOT_FOUND.message: loopback interface required for synchronous local commands
